testcase.brief: Verify that the function of mgt0.x manage
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition:
Test Procedure: 1. Verify that only ping is enabled for mgt0.x and can ping 2. Verify that disable ping function for mgt0.x and can not ping. 3. Verify that other manage packet such as telnet, snmp etc can not arrive the mgt0.x, can ssh mgt0.x 4. Verify that ping function is not lost when dhcp server enable/disable or dhcp relay enable/disable.

step.desc: Set vlan vlan2 to interface mgt0.1 Set ip address to interface mgt0.1 Create a SSID and bind it to interface wifi0 Create a user-profile and set the same vlan with mgt0.1 Set the same attribute to SSID with user-profile
step.telnet: -v "interface mgt0.1 vlan ${br1.vlan4}" -v "interface mgt0.1 ip ${br1.vlan4.dhcp_start}/24" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.vlan4.dhcp_start} ${br1.vlan4.dhcp_end}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server enable" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "security-object ${ssid.name}" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} security-object ${ssid.name}" -v "user-profile ${ssid.name}" -v "security-object ${ssid.name} default-user-profile-attr 1" -v "user-profile ${ssid.name} qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${br1.vlan4} attribute 1" -v "interface ${ssid_bind_interface} ssid ${ssid.name}"

step.desc: Verify that only ping is enabled for mgt0.x and can ping
Verify that other mange packet such as telnet can not arrive the mgt0.x.
Verify that other mange packet such as ssh can arrive the mgt0.x.
Verify that other mange packet such as snmp can not arrive the mgt0.x.
Verify that ping function is not lost when dhcp server disable
